review: Dr. Neeta is a breath of fresh air. From the moment you book the appointment and enter the clinic, you feel cared for. As parents, we have so many questions which Dr. Neeta answers with a lot of patience and understanding. We have never felt rushed. She is warm and wonderful to both our boys and answers all their queries. Dr. Neeta also has exceptional and experienced staff. Her clinic is clean and beautifully kept with lots of toys and reading material to keep the kids busy. We absolutely love her and highly recommend Dr. Neeta Nathani.

review: I am a parent to 2.5 year old twins. I was very anxious and worried at the thought of taking my kids for their vaccination during this time of covid. But all my worries were put to rest by Dr. Neeta Nathani and team. The entire process was very well managed. Only one child and accompanying parent are allowed at one time. Masks and sanitizers are giving to every person walking in. Contact less process is maintained as far as possible. The best part about the whole experience was the preparedness on the part of the doctor and team. A stress free process for the parent and safe environment for the child. I highly recommend Dr. Neeta Nathani !!!
reply_text: Thank you! It is very heartening to see all our efforts are actually useful to our patients. We love appreciation. We are thankful for being in the fortunate position of caring for lovely children and their parents who truly understand how much effort goes into making kids comfortable.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Nathani is an amazing pedia and I always take my twins to her. She explains the issue to the parent in such a way that they understand. She also comforts the baby by getting friendly with them, shows a small clip on her phone where the baby's attention is diverted before taking a vaccination which helps on vaccination appointment. Also keeps the kid happy by giving them a fruit candy or a small gift or making a star on the back of their palm. The nurses and staff is also extremely friendly..Geeta and Netra..alwayssss ready to help..Thanks! My kids love Dr.Nathani's clinic...

review:
I was introduced to Dr. Neeta at the time of my child's birth. My child is 5 now, and we are still coming to her from Kandivali to Chembur, for all the vaccines and health care for our child. She is extremely patient and makes sure that all your queries are taken care of and you don't panic at any situation (splly, with your first child). Very supportive and understanding and very warm. And of course, very very playful and loving with kids.
Blessed that found her since the very beginning.
Thank you Dr. Nivaan loves visiting you! (psst. No fear of injections too)

review:
Dr Neeta is * *** ******* *** ** ************* *** careful about the medicines she prescribes, never overdoing anything. 

However as a mother there are other softer skills that I would say she is üíØ is being patient, empathetic, friendly, ensure all your anxieties are settled before you leave the clinic. Also, believe is explaining *** ******* *** *********. 

The clinic is super child friendly space, it has a home like warmth. The digital savy space also help in no fuss quick transaction and records. 

In all, I would strongly recommend Dr Nathani. Do visit her even if that's a little extra distance for you.
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
** ***** ** * **** **** **************** ********* ** ******** *** **** *************she also replies to our queries over WhatsApp which is very helpful.

I want to share my recent experience cum happy story with Dr. Neeta Nathani.. my daughter had a reflux issue, coz of which she used to vomit at night. So Dr. Nathani asked me not to feed her milk from a bottle at night as it aggravates it and makes her vomit. I had tried but my daughter used to cry a lot and eventually I had to give her the bottle. 

During her last visit to clinic, Dr. Nathani told my daughter a very nice story about how the kitten toy in her clinic wanted a bottle to drink milk as kitten's mom was not with her and she was all alone.. so Dr. Nathani asked my daughter if she will help her and then my daughter agreed to give away the bottle to the kitten..that's it!!

Believe me guys, after that day not even once did she mention the bottleüçº it was a miracle for me.. Dr. Nathani - thank you so much for this and I am forever grateful to youüòá you are awesome!
reply_text:
Thanks a lot.
Happy to know this!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I have a 7 year old daughter who gained weight in pandemic time due to no physical activities. She had crossed 100 percentile in her weight chart. Dr. Neeta Nathani advised and explained me the consequences of over weight in children if not resolved on time. She asked me to make smaller portions of food intake and add interesting physical activity. Now my daughter is back to her original weight and her fitness level. 

My daughter recently had bed wetting issues. I tried almost every precaution and ready many articles to prevent it. Fortunately I had Dr. Nathani yo guide me that my daughter must have gone through emotional stress. She advised me to encourage my daughter with rewards likes stars and other things. This worked well!! She stopped bed wetting finally. I am very grateful to Doctor Nathani. This is a great relief. Thank you so much. 

Thank you so much Doctor.
reply_text: Oh! we are delighted that your lovely daughter is on the road to a lifetime of fitness and good health. Thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback and appreciation. It can only help other patients.

review: the doctor is friendly,we are satisfied with the her explanation regarding vaccination and how to take care baby but one drawback is some times we have to wait for longer times and vehicle parking is not allowed now.
reply_text:
Thank you for your feedback. As far as long wait times are concerned, appointments are scheduled with adequate time for new patients and follow-up patients. This is what is planned. "The best-laid plans of mice and men are likely to go awry" People come late (various reasons), people need longer than scheduled times to clear their concerns (you cannot shoo them off), emergency calls come in... the list is endless. 
Vehicle Parking: is not available, except late in the evening. Which commercial building allows visitor parking in quantity? Mumbai has a perpetual real estate crunch. If you request the security guards nicely, they always allow drop facility either in a private vehicle or public taxis/autos.

tags: Value for money,
review: Consultation fee of Rs. 1200/- is extremely high for the check up performed on baby.  **** **** *** ********** ****** ***
reply_text:
We appreciate your comment about the charges being too high for you. We understand.  In our opinion, we provide great services and this is what we value our services currently. You mentioned on a baby. Actually, it is far more difficult to evaluate and take care of babies since the concerned patient cannot speak up for him/herself. We have to rely on a lot of other factors like the history given by parents (many times this is naturally altered by anxieties and concern), by our examination findings, by our intuitive perceptions gained through years of experience.
There are other pediatricians who charge more and some who charge less. Luckily, we all find our doctors based on those best suited for our needs.

very attentive, practical and makes a great effort 
to comfort the child. Explains the problem very clearly and encourages questions. Parking available as well. Fantastic overall
reply_text:
Thanks for your kind words.
With ref to parking: Vikas center is one of the iconic commercial complexes in our suburb. To maintain proper functioning, the builder has given us a drop and pick up facility.
They are a little strict and do not allow visitors to park inside like any other commercial complex.
Sometimes in non-office hours or when there is an emergency, the security allows you to park your vehicle inside.
So please remember that parking is not allowed inside the complex.
And if the security tells you specifically not to park, then please follow the instructions; otherwise, the maintenance people put a lot of restrictions on our patients who genuinely need special care.
